documentation.text:
alculate and return (newAmount, newSlope), using formula:
 k = (ST_FORMULA_COMPENSATE + ST_FORMULA_CLIFF_MULTIPLIER * (cliffPeriod)^2 + ST_FORMULA_SLOPE_MULTIPLIER * (slopePeriod)^2) / ST_FORMULA_MULTIPLIER
 newAmount = k * amount / ST_FORMULA_DIVIDER
 newSlope = newAmount / slopePeriod*

attributes.text:
alculate and return (newAmount, newSlope), using formula:
 k = (ST_FORMULA_COMPENSATE + ST_FORMULA_CLIFF_MULTIPLIER * (cliffPeriod)^2 + ST_FORMULA_SLOPE_MULTIPLIER * (slopePeriod)^2) / ST_FORMULA_MULTIPLIER
 newAmount = k * amount / ST_FORMULA_DIVIDER
 newSlope = newAmount / slopePeriod*

Delegate(uint256,address,address,uint256.details: Emitted when to set newDelegate address for Lock with given id

Migrate(address,uint256[]).details: Emitted when migrate Locks with given id, account - msg.sender

Restake(uint256,address,address,uint256,.details: Emitted when change Lock parameters (newDelegate, newAmount, newSlope, newCliff) for Lock with given id

StakeCreate(uint256,address,address,uint.details: Emitted when create Lock with parameters (account, delegate, amount, slope, cliff)

StartMigration(address,address).details: StartMigration initiate migration to another contract, account - msg.sender, to - address delegate to

StopStaking(address).details: Stop run contract functions, accept withdraw, account - msg.sender

Withdraw(address,uint256).details: Emitted when withdraw amount of Rari, account - msg.sender, amount - amount Rari

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

migrateTo.details: address to migrate Stakes to (zero if not in migration state)

stopped.details: true if contract entered stopped state

getStake(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: alculate and return (newAmount, newSlope), using formula: k = (ST_FORMULA_COMPENSATE + ST_FORMULA_CLIFF_MULTIPLIER * (cliffPeriod)^2 + ST_FORMULA_SLOPE_MULTIPLIER * (slopePeriod)^2) / ST_FORMULA_MULTIPLIER newAmount = k * amount / ST_FORMULA_DIVIDER newSlope = newAmount / slopePeriod*
